name: JamMan Vocal XT
details:
Dedicated Stompbox Looper for VocalistsFeatures
10 minutes of looping time
Built-in dbx® Mic Preamp
+48V Phantom Power
XLR Input & Output
JamSync™ - automatically synchronizes with other JamSync-enabled JamMan pedals
Silent Clear™ - clears loop memory without starting playback first
Separate LEDs for Record, Overdub, and Play Status
Unlimited Overdubs with Undo and Redo
Included 9VDC Power Supply
Durable metal chassis and footswitch
24-bit 44.1kHz sample rate
Specifications
A/D Converter   24 bit
Sample Rate 44.1 kHz
Input Connectors    1 x XLR Female, 1/8" JamSync In
Output Connectors   1 x XLR Male, 1/8" JamSync Out
Dimensions  4.8” x 3.4” x 2.1” (L x W x H)
Weight  .6 lbs. / 0.272 kgs.
Power Supply    PS0913DC-01 (US, JA); PS0913DC-02 (EU, AU, UK)
http://digitech.com/en-US/products/jamman-vocal-xt
